patthana12.3:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.3:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.3:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:8.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:9.1_0: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.3:10.1_0: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
